description: List maintenance requirement rule maintenance requirement sets with filtering and pagination
permissions: User must be authorized to view the related maintenance requirement rule. Access follows MaintenanceRequirementRulePolicy#show? and scope: admins; broker managers; operations users with appropriate business unit membership; and technician business unit members within scope.

flags.description: Filter by maintenance requirement rule ID
